attributes.additional_details: Brightsparks is a fantastic daycare group in Rossington Doncaster, They take on goverment funded Children (ie children whos parents are on benefits) for 15 hours a week, Ofstead have unfairly stopped there funding, which means children (like my 3 year old) are losing there spaces, the children are supported fantasticily by staff members. Its unfair that this is going to happen to the children please sign and see if we can get the decision reversed!
